subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Once he was half of one of the greatest rivalries in sports.  But Smokin’ Joe Frazier has lost a fortune and lives alone in an apartment above a gym in a run-down part of Philadelphia.
snippet: Once he was half of one of the greatest rivalries in sports.  But Smokin’ Joe Frazier has lost a fortune and lives alone in an apartment above a gym in a run-down part of Philadelphia.
